name: eSaviour Ltd.
tag_list: advertise, advertising, business, businesses, service, services, expertise, help, live-chat, projects, outsourcing
overview:
eSaviour.com is about connecting people with the help and expertise they need.

• eSaviour.com allows businesses (or those offering a service) to place a free customisable advert describing their business, qualifications and experience.

• For existing businesses it offers an additional avenue to promote themselves.

• All businesses need to do is access the website by typing esaviour.com in the address bar, or type esaviour.com in Google, just create an account and click ‘I want to be an eSaviour’.

• Customers can post projects e.g. “I need a fence building”. They can attract quotes from the “eSaviours” + make payments through the site.

• They can also speak to the eSaviours LIVE through live chat on the website, making this function widely accessible to all businesses.

• There are around 800 categories, catering for a huge range of businesses and skills - joinery, plumbing, accountancy, website design and wood carving to name a few.

• I am hoping it will ultimately increase prospects for the thousands of people who have skills and expertise but are unable to find work due to the current financial climate

• It’s completely free to use.
